parameters: Who am I kidding, why wouldn’t you.
I am one of the nine muses afterall.
Yeah, it’s very smooth, I like it.
Nah, it’s not to my taste.
Yeah, it’s very smooth, I like it.
Nah, it’s not to my taste.
Hmph, well some people just have bad taste.
She’s spent far too much time with Narcissus.
That’s a lovely flute you have
I actually play the flute myself.
He’s actually a real big softie.
I’m surprised, he found you faster than I expected.
Well, why are you still here?
